name: Tune Up
description: Tune Up is an app of simplicity that searches artist albums and lyrics. Our app features a search engine that returns a visual list of the inputted artist, as well as text lyrics of selected songs.

name: Workday Scheduler
description: Hourly planner that allows Users to save important tasks in a color-coordinated planner which tracks the past, present and future in real time.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: Eat-Da-Burger is a burger logger created with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM. It allows the User to log burgers they'd like to eat to the menu and track which one's they've eaten.

name: Mood Swings
description: App that allows the User to select their current mood and retrieve relevant content.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: The User can search for weather conditions by city and receive the current conditions as well as the five day forecast.

name: Password Generator
description: A random password generator that lets the User dictate how many characters and which character types to include.
